decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively play low-cost spells and creatures to deal damage to the opponent as fast as possible. Utilizing cheap spells like Lava Dart, Lightning Bolt, and Mutagenic Growth, along with efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early in the game. The inclusion of cards like Slickshot Show-Off and Violent Urge adds additional pressure and disruption to the opponent's game plan. Overall, this deck is geared towards a fast-paced aggressive strategy to win games quickly.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying artifacts and using them to generate a significant advantage over the opponent. By playing cheap artifacts like Mishra's Bauble and Emry, Lurker of the Loch, the deck can quickly ramp up and overwhelm the opponent. Cards like Cori-Steel Cutter and Kappa Cannoneer provide aggression and removal options. The key to the deck's success lies in its ability to efficiently use artifacts to gain tempo and control the game, ultimately leading to a fast victory.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize a combination of spells and creatures to quickly assemble a win condition without relying on traditional land cards. By using cards like Lotus Bloom and Whir of Invention to generate mana and search for key pieces like Goblin Charbelcher, the deck aims to create a powerful combo that can quickly deal damage to the opponent. The deck also includes disruption spells like Spell Snare and Suppression Ray to control the game and protect its combo pieces.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying threats and dealing direct damage to the opponent. Utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, it aims to pressure the opponent's life total early on. The deck also includes cards like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge for combat tricks and additional damage. With a low mana curve and efficient spells, this deck aims to be fast and aggressive in order to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on using Allosaurus Rider and Neoform to quickly assemble a powerful combo involving Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant and Planar Genesis. The key strategy is to ramp up mana with cards like Disciple of Freyalise and Birthing Ritual, while protecting the combo with counterspells like Pact of Negation. Additionally, cards like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Boseiju, Who Endures help to ensure the combo resolves successfully. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a massive board presence and finish them off in a single explosive turn.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using a variety of spells and creature abilities without relying on traditional land cards. It utilizes cards that allow the player to manipulate the game state, counter opponent's spells, and effectively search for key pieces of the combo. By combining cards like Goblin Charbelcher, Lotus Bloom, and Hydroelectric Specimen, the deck aims to create a winning board state quickly and efficiently. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around playing proactively and disrupting the opponent's game plan to secure a victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly get creatures into the graveyard and then reanimate them for powerful effects. This is done through cards like Faithless Looting, Unearth, and Persist. By utilizing cards that enable graveyard recursion and powerful creatures with abilities that can turn the game in your favor, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with high-value creatures while controlling the board with spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. The combo aspect of the deck lies in being able to set up a quick and explosive win condition through the reanimation of impactful creatures like Archon of Cruelty.

The deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands to generate a large amount of mana quickly. It utilizes control elements like Thought-Knot Seer and All Is Dust to disrupt the opponent's strategy while deploying powerful threats like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon. The deck's win condition is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful Eldrazi creatures and planeswalkers while maintaining control of the game with counter spells and removal. The key strategy is to efficiently ramp up mana production and disrupt the opponent's game plan through a combination of board control and resource denial.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the powerful Urza lands (Urza's Tower, Power Plant, Mine) to generate a large amount of mana quickly, allowing for the casting of high-cost spells like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, Eye of the Storms. The deck also includes Eldrazi creatures and powerful colorless spells to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Chalice of the Void and Expedition Map help to further control the game and ensure the deck's success in a 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on utilizing Eldrazi creatures and ramp spells to control the game. By ramping up quickly with cards like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple, the deck can cast powerful threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker ahead of schedule. Control elements such as Kozilek's Command and Kozilek's Return help to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while cards like Malevolent Rumble and Ghost Quarter offer additional removal options. With a mix of ramp, control, and powerful Eldrazi threats, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and take control of the game.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly get creatures on the board and deal damage to the opponent as efficiently as possible. The deck features low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, along with instant damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart. It also includes cards that can manipulate the top of the deck, such as Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration, to help maintain card advantage. Overall, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive tempo strategy and close out the game as quickly as possible.

The deck focuses on aggressive play with a mix of efficient creatures and disruptive spells to control the opponent's board. It utilizes cheap spells like Unholy Heat and Lightning Bolt to remove threats while using countermagic like Counterspell and Spell Snare to protect its own creatures. The deck also includes card draw and selection with Expressive Iteration and Consider to maintain card advantage and consistency. Additionally, the inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage and filtering, while Mishra's Bauble offers additional information and synergy with other cards in the deck.

This Aggro - Affinity deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of artifacts and efficient creatures. By using cards like Springleaf Drum, Mox Opal, and Mishra's Bauble, the deck aims to generate a large amount of mana and card advantage. Arcbound Ravager and Ornithopter can quickly become threatening threats, especially when combined with Pinnacle Emissary and Kappa Cannoneer. The deck also includes cards like Thoughtcast and Sink into Stupor to provide additional card draw and disruption. The mana base is optimized with lands like Urza's Saga and Spirebluff Canal to ensure consistent casting of spells.

The deck focuses on generating a quick burst of mana through rituals and medallions, allowing the player to chain together high impact spells like Past in Flames and Grapeshot. The deck also utilizes card filtering and draw spells to help find key combo pieces quickly. Additionally, the deck runs a small Wishboard for added versatility in accessing specific cards when needed. Ultimately, the goal is to assemble the necessary pieces to create a powerful storm turn and finish the game with a massive Grapeshot or other burn spells.

This deck focuses on using ramp spells and mana acceleration to quickly play powerful Eldrazi creatures, while also controlling the board with removal spells and disruptive effects. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with big threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker, while using cards like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command to disrupt their game plan. By combining ramp and control elements, this deck aims to dominate the late game and secure a victory through sheer power and resilience.

This deck focuses on fast aggression and efficient creature removal. It utilizes powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge help deal with threats and control the board. The deck also includes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory to provide additional support and buffs to your creatures. With a mix of aggressive creatures, removal spells, and support cards, this Boros Aggro deck aims to win the game quickly and decisively.
